---
name: RFC (Request for Comments)
about: Propose a major change or new feature that requires discussion
title: '[RFC] '
labels: rfc, discussion
assignees: ''
---

## Summary

A brief summary of the proposed change.

## Motivation

Why is this change needed? What problem does it solve?

## Detailed Design

Explain the design in detail. Include:

- Technical approach
- API changes
- Breaking changes
- Migration path
- Trade-offs considered

## Examples

Code examples showing the proposed feature in action.

## Alternatives

What alternatives did you consider? Why was this approach chosen?

## Unresolved Questions

What questions or concerns need to be resolved?

## Timeline

- [ ] Discussion period (2 weeks)
- [ ] Implementation
- [ ] Testing
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Release

## References

Links to related issues, discussions, or external resources.
